data: Evelyn Preston ran lightly up the steps of her home and inserting her latch-key in the vestibule door, pushed it open just as the taxi-driver, following more slowly with many an upward glance at the blind-closed windows, reached her side.

EVELYN PRESTON ran lightly up the steps of her home and inserting her latch-key in the vestibule door, pushed it open just as the taxi-driver, following more slowly with many an upward glance at the blind-closed windows, reached her side.
Lincoln, Natalie Sumner, 1881-1935; Wrenn, Charles L. (Charles Lewis), 1880-1952 [Illustrator]
